metadata.title: CVE-2024-31581 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg version n6.1 was discovered to contain an improper validation ofarray index vulnerability in libavcodec/cbs_h266_syntax_template.c. Thisvulnerability allows attackers to cause undefined behavior within theapplication.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
